Sunhawk got to the base.  He scanned it and saw both the Preds had 
escaped.  He managed to manuever in flight mode through the halls 
(knocking minimul stuff over of course) 4 or 5 times faster than 
running.  He landed and transformed right in front of them.

Sunhawk:  If you wanted a drink of energon you could have just 
asked.  Now on the tables both of you.  I intend to make sure you're 
both properly restrained this time.

He draws him energon sword and holds it at close distance before they 
have time to draw they're weapons so they'll get slashed if they do.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@c...> wrote:
> ::Hot Rod::
> 
> Waspinator's shots struck near Hot Rod but did not hit him. He was 
about to return fire, with Grimlock started to deal with it.
> 
> Then Hot Rod came under attack by Perceptor. Hot Rod manuvered 
around the shots, and attempted to shoulder block Perceptor.
> 
> ::Kup::
> 
> With the wall of fire Kup could not see Megatron as well, but he 
wasn't about to stop. Kup switched his rifle to rapid fire, and 
started to spray the sky with plasma charges, in Megatrons direction.
> 
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> He got out of his cell at the Maximal base, and saw Nightshade.
> 
> "If the Maximals are engaging da boss, we have to help him!"
